SEARCH
Package proj

Class Student

java.lang.Object
proj.User
proj.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Student extends User
Represents a Student user in the mobility service. This class extends User and includes details specific to students, such as their course and university pole. Students have their own pricing model for vehicle rentals.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String mechNo, String paymentMethod, String course, String pole)
      Constructs a new Student user with academic details.
      Parameters:
      mechNo - The student's unique mechanical number.
      paymentMethod - The student's preferred payment method.
      course - The student's course of study.
      pole - The university pole the student is primarily associated with (e.g., "Polo I").

  • Method Details

    • getCourse

      public String getCourse()
      Gets the student's course of study.
      Returns:
      The course name.

    • getPole

      public String getPole()
      Gets the university pole the student is associated with.
      Returns:
      The pole name (e.g., "Polo I").

    • setCourse

      public void setCourse(String course)
      Sets the student's course of study.
      Parameters:
      course - The new course name.

    • setPole

      public void setPole(String pole)
      Sets the university pole for the student.
      Parameters:
      pole - The new pole name (e.g., "Polo II").

    • getValue

      public float[] getValue()
      Retrieves the pricing values specific to a Student. This method returns the first row of the pricing table, which contains student-specific rates.
      Overrides:
      getValue in class User
      Returns:
      The first row of the pricing table.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Student.
      Overrides:
      toString in class User
      Returns:
      A string detailing the student's information.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(Bicycle bicycle)
      Gets the hourly rental rate for a Bicycle based on the student price table. The price varies depending on whether the bicycle is for one or two people.
      Overrides:
      getPrice in class User
      Parameters:
      bicycle - The Bicycle to be priced.
      Returns:
      €1.00/hr for one seat, €2.00/hr for two seats.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(Scooter scooter)
      Gets the hourly rental rate for a Scooter based on the student price table. The price depends on whether the scooter is equipped with an LCD screen.
      Overrides:
      getPrice in class User
      Parameters:
      scooter - The scooter to price.
      Returns:
      €1.00/hr for no LCD, €1.10/hr with LCD.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(Ebike ebike)
      Gets the hourly rental rate for an Ebike based on the student price table. The price is determined by whether the e-bike has a removable battery.
      Overrides:
      getPrice in class User
      Parameters:
      ebike - The e-bike to price.
      Returns:
      €1.25/hr for fixed battery, €1.50/hr for removable.
